input.sentences: a wealthy family held their own private party on haloween .
a local rock band was hired to perform
a trained monkey was brought in to ride the dog .
a masked anthropologist brought a recent discovery from the organization .
food was served | but few people ate .
output.sentences: Chewbacca hosted a private party at a friend's house.
He hired a band to play music at his party and asked everyone to dress up.
Even his friend's dog buster dressed up.
Chewbacca had a lot of fun.
They ended the night with a scary story with all of the lights out.
